page.title: 10FERNLEIGH REST HOME,LEASOWE
page.content: I visited the only Old People's Home within Leasowe,called{Fernleigh.}In Fernleigh there are 66 residents,12 men and 54 ladies.The oldest person there is 99 years old,and her name is Mrs. Mary Jones.The youngest person is 65 years old. There are 66 beds available,with 4 lounges,one large dining area,1 large kitchen,and 3 small kitchens.5 beds are kept for emergency,for people who desperately need to go into the home. The staff are mainly part-time (night staff included),and mostly women. The residents have several pets to keep them company,and a small rose garden.The local senior schoolchildren visit to talk and help with gardening. More could be done to keep the people amused and interested,but generally the home is bright and comfortable. {(Rachael Parry)
